summary:
Snufkin's age is so,, confusing.
When I first saw him, I legit though he was a child; but then I heard his voice (specifically...
body:
Snufkin’s age is so,, confusing.

When I first saw him, I legit though he was a child; but then I heard his voice (specifically in the 1990’s English dub version), and now I’m just,, even more confused.

I personally headcanon him to be at least 19 (or possibly even early 20’s), mainly due to his voice/how he acts. I’m definitely open to other age h/cs, but I personally can’t see him being any younger than 17, in all honesty ;;

summary: How to say I Love You
title: How to say I Love You
body:
1. Je t'aime. Language: French. …
  2. Te amo. Language: Spanish. …
  3. Ich liebe Dich. Language: German. …
  4. 我爱你 (Wo ai ni) Language: Mandarin Chinese. …
  5. 愛してる (Aishiteru) Language: Japanese. …
    6. (softly) Moomin…Language: Snufkin

tags: somebody reblogged a clip on my dash bc hehe funny snufkin and i got hit with buried deep childhood memories
summary: as somebody who grew up with the moomins and cant recall most of my childhood, seeing the 1977 stopmotion series on my dash in...
body: as somebody who grew up with the moomins and cant recall most of my childhood, seeing the 1977 stopmotion series on my dash in the year of god two thousand and nineteen feels so fucking surreal. if not for the tumblr moomin renaissance, somebody could tell me it was actually a candle cove style phenomenon and i’d probably believe them because that’s what it felt like watching the groke on a grainy ass tv as a little kid. i know i watched the stopmotion series a lot but i honest to god cant remember anything other from it other than seeing the groke come and just accepting that it would come for me too, no questions asked

tags: i actually love how they handled the groke in the episode
this is just for shits n giggles
summary:
Moomin and Sniff in Night of The Groke: we're scared
Snufkin: there's nothing to fear except fear itself
Snufkin: and of course...
body:
Moomin and Sniff in Night of The Groke: we’re scared

Snufkin: there’s nothing to fear except fear itself

Snufkin: and of course the groke, a wandering creature stitched together from actual nightmares who can freeze your soul with one fucking look, i’m telling you moomin, one single fucking look is all it takes for you to start pissing blood on the spot

Moomin:

Snufkin: but we hardly count her lol! good night :)
